job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Partner Software is seeking a Mid-Level Full Stack Developer/Engineer for the Map Platform team. We are looking for a motivated developer who wants to own the design and development of an application used to process, analyze, and display geographic data.  If you have a desire to take lead on a project and build simple yet powerful programs, you will be a great fit. You will also enjoy the benefits of working in a small and fast paced business that is backed with the necessary resources to enhance your career and have your efforts play a key role in the success of the company.
